title: Womens Maxi Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan beautiful in quality and color, with one mentioning it's perfect for cold nights. They appreciate its comfort, describing it as a cozy hug, and like how it fits, with one noting it covers the bottom and upper thighs well. The size receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it larger than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Cardigan is not just warm, it's like a cozy hug too!
items.body: I bought this for my wife, and here is her review; Honey you don't have to be Irish to enjoy this Sweater! I love a warm sweater, for me this Ladies Merino Knit Wool Cardigan has all the bells and whistles. A great hoodie for a no hat day but something to cover the top of my head & back of my neck when the winds are blowing. A button down so I don't mess up my hair or mess up my make-up by pulling it down over my head, or choking me around my chin & neck. Next, I like the fact that it's long enough to help keep the buns & thighs warm on those cold days at the sports field, Yup! Aran covers my bottom & upper thighs quite well while keeping them cozy and warm on those cold stadium seats while watching the game. Also, the sleeves flair out a bit which just makes this Sweater so much fun I can fold them up and it still doesn't feel too bulky. Finally, the pockets one for the Cellphone, and the other for the tissues, hanky & my small cash purse. Love, love, lovely! Thanks, Woollen Mills of Ireland you made me so happy and you've given me moments to enjoy life cozy and warm, I send you back a hug too! Read more
items.author: EEnginer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect Fall sweater
items.body: I like the color and weight of the sweater. I love the quality of the brand and the warmth it provides. Read more
items.author: Kristin Harris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made
items.body: This was a gift for someone who had recently visited Ireland but had not indulged in much shopping. I was so concerned because she wears size small and a medium was the smallest available in the color we wanted. But she loved it and the way it fit. Enough room to wear another type of sweater underneath but still not looked oversized if she doesn’t. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooo Warm!!!
items.body: I haven't been able to find a real wool sweater that I like in such a long time. This one is great! Warm and fits well. The length is just right, the sleeves are a little short on my arms, but I can definitely live with it. I can't stand a turtleneck sweather, so this one is great! We live in Alaska, in a part where in the winter there is a really nasty wind from the north and our house is cooler then we would like it to be. I put this sweater on as soon as I opened the parcel, and BOOM! warm! I will buy another if every I need to. Hope to have this one for a Lonnnnnng time :) Well done! Read more
items.author: Home Again

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
items.body: This is a pretty sweater.... but it's stiffer and scratchier than any other merino wool I have. Runs kinda small too. Read more
items.author: Jeanne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: I found the size to be more like a medium. Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Warm, and Beautiful!
items.body: Love this Irish Wool Cardigan! I wear it a lot, and get lots of compliments! Read more
items.author: Susan Jaye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
items.body: Quality, fit, color exactly as shown. This is my 3rd purchase from them. Read more
items.author: Happy customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Derby, Army Green, Wicker. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
